com.esri.svr.map
Class ServletMapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.svr.map.BaseMOJMapper
        |
        +--com.esri.svr.map.ServletMapper
public class ServletMapper
extends BaseMOJMapper

The ServletMapper provides functionality as a map server that runs within the servlet container. It uses the functions provided by BaseMapper class.

select

protected Feature[] select(String mapName,
                           int selectedLayer,
                           String extent,
                           String queryString,
                           String findString,
                           double bufferDistance,
                           String bufferUnit,
                           int targetLayer)
                    throws RemoteException
Description copied from class: BaseMOJMapper
Select features based on the given query string or find string or buffer distance, and map extent for a selected layer in a given service. When buffer is applied, the return features will be those from target layer.

Specified by:
select in class BaseMOJMapper
Parameters:
mapName - the service name
selectedLayer - selected layer index
extent - the query map extent
queryString - the query string
findString - the find string
bufferDistance - the buffer distance
bufferUnit - the buffer unit
targetLayer - the target layer that the buffer will apply to
Returns:
a set of features
Throws:
RemoteException
See Also:
BaseMOJMapper.select(java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

Description copied from class: BaseMOJMapper
Get a response based on the given set of parameters. Only one of the three functions (query, find and buffer) will apply in a single call.

Specified by:
getResponse in class BaseMOJMapper

                             String mapTitle)

getLayoutImage in class BaseMOJMapper
Parameters:

width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisibility - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
findString - the spatial query filter
mapTitle - the map title text
